p.n: MotoGP Classics: MotoGP Classics: Valencia GP 2011

p.n: UEFA Europa League: Tottenham v Fiorentina 2015/16
p.k: 2015/16 Europa League last 32 second leg action between Tottenham and Fiorentina at White Hart Lane. Spurs were favourites after a 1-1 draw in their away leg

p.k: 2015/16 Europa League last 32 second leg action between Manchester United and Midtjylland at Old Trafford. The Reds suffered a humiliating 2-1 defeat in the first leg
